thread.title: Volleyball Roundup: Allatoona defends Area 5 title
thread.title_full: Volleyball Roundup: Allatoona defends Area 5 title

author: MDJ staff reports (noreply@mdjonline.com)
title: Volleyball Roundup: Allatoona defends Area 5 title
text: Volleyball Roundup: Allatoona defends Area 5 title by MDJ staff reports The Marietta Daily Journal  26 AM | 321 views | 0 | 3 | | Allatoona swept Chapel Hill 25-15, 25-17, 25-13 in Saturday’s championship match to defend its Area 5 title. The Lady Buccaneers beat Hiram 25-12, 25-22 in the semifinals earlier in the day.Jada Armstrong had 19 kills in the two matches, while Mikayla Morris contributed with five aces. Jedaiah Daniels added 12 kills and eight blocks. Jaslynn Gwyn, the area player of the year, had nine blocks and 15 kills on the day, and Meara Simmons had 59 assists and Katie Cory had 27 digs.Allatoona will host Kell in the first round Thursday.The Lady Longhorns are back in the postseason for the first time since 2011 as the fifth seed for Area 7 . After falling to River Ridge in straight sets in the consolation bracket Thursday, they battled Sprayberry for the fifth seed and won 25-17, 25-21. Gracie White had 42 digs for the tournament and Bella Smart added 41. Jazzlyn Kenner had 21 kills and 12½ blocks, and Joanna Tiller had 35 assists. ► Hillgrove takes third in area: Hillgrove defeated Kennesaw Mountain 25-22, 25-21 to seal Area 4 ’s third seed for the Class state tournament. Janna Jernigan had seven kills and two aces, and Quinn Dunlap added four kills. Allison Purdue had 18 assists, and Myah Martin led defensively with 15 digs. Hillgrove will play at Lambert in the first round Thursday.
